TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StopRoutingHandler extends System.Object implements class System.Web.Routing.IRouteHandler

summary.span: 提供一种方式，用于指定 ASP.NET 路由不应处理 URL 模式的请求。

span.span: Provides a way to specify that ASP.NET routing should not handle requests for a URL pattern.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可用于指定 ASP.NET 路由应不处理某些 URL 请求。The class enables you to specify that ASP.NET routing should not handle certain URL requests. 阻止路由通过定义路由，并指定处理特定请求类应用于处理该路由的模式。You prevent routing from handling certain requests by defining a route and specifying that the class should be used to handle that route's pattern. 通过处理请求时对象，对象会阻止为路由请求的任何其他处理。When a request is handled by a object, the object blocks any additional processing of the request as a route. 相反，为 ASP.NET 页、 Web 服务或其他 ASP.NET 终结点处理该请求。Instead, the request is processed as an ASP.NET page, Web service, or other ASP.NET endpoint. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何阻止处理.axd 请求的路由。The following example shows how to prevent routing from handling requests for .axd requests. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Routing.StopRoutingHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.StopRoutingHandler/cs/Global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Routing.StopRoutingHandler#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Routing.StopRoutingHandler/vb/Global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
